meta.title: About | Denton Design
meta.description: A creative director with 15+ years experience.

approach.label: Approach
approach.content:
![Denton Design Diagram](/images/design_diagram.svg)
I started as a designer and worked my way up the creative ladder. I pride myself on leading by example and getting the most out of my teams. My management style is rooted in trust, respect, and growth across all levels. This approach has brought professional success and helped me forge strong, lasting bonds over the years. Some of my clients have included UnitedHealthcare, Mazda, USA Basketball, Land O’Lakes, Thomson Reuters, Allstate, Eli Lilly, Skadden, Navigant, Kirkland & Ellis, William Blaire, and West Monroe. the design tenets I have carried with me along the way include:
## Less is lovely ## Details are delightful ## research is required ## collaboration is crucial ## sell a story
these ingredients generate an environment where wonderful things can grow.

contact.caption: I'd love to tell you more!

brownEvent.title: Happy birthday to me!
brownEvent.content: born, Learned to crawl, said my first word, went to school, made a best friend, took a field trip to a museum, drew every day, got in trouble for drawing every day, broke my arm, saw “E.T.” (cried), heard Beastie Boys “Licensed to Ill” (danced), beat Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!!, rode a huffy bike, got hit by a car on a huffy bike, started my amateur rap career (record labels passed), saw niagra falls, worked in a grocery store, drove a Renault sportwagon (oof), dunked a basketball, won some art awards, graduated high school, left home
